entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being hidden beneath an Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who is battling Voldemort, mentioned alongside Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as being battled by Neville and Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A person who is shouting for Harry, mentioned in a state of panic.

relationships.description: Voldemort is battling Neville, as described by the text: 'Hagrid's yell came loudest of all / “HARRY!” Hagrid shouted. “HARRY — WHERE’S HARRY?”'
Voldemort is battling Harry, as described by the text: 'Hagrid's yell came loudest of all / “HARRY!” Hagrid shouted. “HARRY — WHERE’S HARRY?”'

Harry is being battled by Voldemort, as described by the text: 'Hidden beneath the Invisibility Cloak, Harry cast a Shield Charm between Neville and Voldemort / before the latter could raise his wand.'
Hagrid is calling out to Harry, as described by the text: '“HARRY!” Hagrid shouted. “HARRY — WHERE’S HARRY?”'
